author: dongsheng
msg: * subversion/po/zh_CN.po: Update Project-Id-Version to 1.9, translate new strings.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Removed the French profile ("FRA" namespace), since they are not yet fully isolated in an optional module.

author: markt
msg: If the client closed the connection, the write of any remainign data in the buffer in AbstractServletOutputStream would fail but the remote endpoint was not notified. This meant that blocking writes would block for ever eventually locking up the entire server.
